this_title: O Porão Da Rua Do Grito
introduction: Blood Window Showcase introduces O PORÃO DA RUA DO GRITO dir. Sabrina Greve , best work in progress award in Blood Window program in Ventana Sur 2021. Additionally, the projection of an outstanding reel of upcoming genre-films from Latin America.The siblings Jonas and Rebeca live on Scream Street. Haunted by guilt over their parents' death, they developed an obsessive dependency in one another. They have almost no external contact: all they do is take care of their grandmother and of a child trapped in the basement. When Rebeca begins to seek independence, Jonas will not allow her to break free from the fantasy they created.
chinese_title: O Porão Da Rua Do Grito
